column4: Hi, I should update the kernel of ubuntu 10.10 to a newer version. Can I use the packages for natty in this page? http://kernel.ubuntu.com/~kernel-ppa/mainline/
why do you want to update?
ok, then using that ppa is reasonable. Make sure you keep a maverick kernel around though so you have something to fall back on
Is v2.6.37-rc2-maverick/ the newest kernel that can I install?
